title: LoL delay help!
body:
Hello!

I've been having a delay/lag when i log in to the client and when i'm in game. It's so annoying in team fights, and when i'm not in game, it takes so much time to get to profile or the store, i mean the response from the server is bad or something..
I have repaired the client and i got a fresh windows.. I got a stable ping at 38. I don't know what the problem could be. I don't think its my connection.

Do you guys have had the same problem? 
What should i do?

Thanks!

replies.body:
Same happening with me :(
Stable ping but get lag of 2-3 seconds sometimes

Hmmmmm so the client itself is laggy as well as when you're in-game? It could be that your network is having a hard time grabbing the data from our servers, so it takes a few seconds before it can display everything in the store/loot tabs. 

Let's cover the typical causes by going through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you have any questions!

I have already done everything there, client delay is ok for me np.
The annoying thing is when it happens in game. It's like everything stops for a second or less.. 
Is there anything more i can do except the connection troubleshoot?

Well, it's good we were able to rule out some possibilities. Your best bet at this point would be to get a little one on one help from us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to go much more in depth there!
